115321.content:
it was just another regular summer day. The Tennison family was camping in the forest, Grandpa Ma took Ben fishing to the nearby river and Gwen elected to stay back at the Rust Bucket. Gwen was in the middle of reading a magazine when a small alien looking device flew through the open window, bu before she got a chance to become concerned, the small device produced a hologram of a familiar face. It was Azmuth creator of the Omnitrix.

"Gwen Tennyson, i have a very important matter to discuss regarding your cousin Ben" Azmuth said in a serious tone.

"Yeah, what about the little twerp?" Gwen asked.

"It has come to my attention that Ben is very unqualified as a wielder of the Omnitrix. He has proven time and time again that he cannot be trusted with such great power. So i have elected to give the Omnitrix to someone far more serious and responsible, namely you. Here's the deal: i shall remove the Omnitrix from Ben and shrink him down to 1 inch. 1231211.content: Gwen was bored one day and decided to walk around in her house thinking of something to do. As she walked around she noticed the closet door was cracked open. She walked over to the door to close it, but was not able to because something was getting caught on the other side. So Gwen then opened up the door to see what it was and found out that it was a bike pump laying down sticking out from the door frame. Gwen picked up the bike pump and was just about to put the pump away until she heard music coming from the T.v in the other room. She walked over into the living room with the pump still in her hand to see that her favorite cartoon show was on. As she watched the show for a bit there was a scene in the show showing one of the female characters getting her butt blown up like a balloon. Once that scene was over Gwen then snapped back into reality and looked back down at the pump. At that moment a thought came to her as she wondered " Is it possible if I could do that" she questioned. She stood there looking at the pump just remembering the inflation scene from the show. Just imagining that happening to her was getting Gwen quite curious. Finally Gwen decided to place the bike pump on the floor and grab the hose. 12321.content:
Ben was fiddling around with the omnitrix one day. The watch like device beeping and booping while he pressed buttons on it.

It was a rainy day in Los Angelos, California, which was where Ben, Gwen and their Grandpa Max were currently staying for their summer trip around the country. There hadn't been any alien activity for a while, as well as any robberies. So Ben didn't have to go alien and fight any crimes. He was currently in the RV while bored out of his mind. He decided to try and mess around with the omnitrix, hoping that he would unlock a new alien by accident or unlock the master control again so he could switch between aliens whenever he wanted and stay an alien as long as he wanted.

He had many alien powers at his disposal. But what he didn't know was that the omnitrix had another ability that he was about to find out.

Gwen, barefoot in her bed, was reading a magazine as she heard Ben mess with the watch. "You know you're just asking for trouble if you mess around with that thing Ben" she said as she turned to him.

"Aw come on, don't you want to know how many aliens are in this thing Gwen. I'm gonna keep rigging it until i unlock them all" he said confidently. "Did you forget all the times you broke the watch because of wanting to do that" Gwen said. "Yeah, but this time I know what I'm doing. I am totally gonna learn everything about this watch" Ben said. "Yeah, yeah, just don't go crying when you break it again" she said. "Ooooh, I'm so scared dweeb" Ben said to Gwen.

5 minutes passed while Ben pressed many buttons and turned the dial many times until...

"Woah, what's going on" Ben said. the omnitrix began glowing as something in it was activated. "I told you not to mess with it dweeb" Gwen said.

A bright light enveloped the RV as the omnitrix shot out a bright light from its dial. The light however zapped Gwen. "Aaaaaaah" she said as she was being mutated by the watch.

"Gwen" Ben shouted as he saw Gwen being transformed into something as the light around her dissipated. In a few moments Gwen was...

123211.content:
Gwen opened her eyes as she looked around at Ben. The funny thing was she felt like she only had one eye. "Ben, wha-what happened" she said. Ben simply stood speechless looking at her while he was freaked out. Gwen wondered why he was looking at her like that.

"Uh, what are you looking at" Gwen said. Ben brought a mirror to her face. She was shocked when saw what she had become.

Her hair was now a light green color and longer, drooping down to her back. Her eyes, now gone, were replaced with one large blue eye in the middle of her face where her eyes were. Her face was now green like a plant. In fact, her entire body was green. Both sides of her neck now had two yellow venus fly trap mouth halves sticking out of them with thorns coming out them and had 2 blue bulbs sticking out of her shoulders. She was still wearing her blue shirt with a cat logo on it, but the back of her shirt was torn to pieces as she discovered 6 seeds sticking out of her back. Finally, her feet and legs had been transformed into tendrils, waving around like tentacles as she attempted to move her toes but instead wiggled her tendrils. Her hands were long and sharp like thorny vines and as green as they could be, covered with chlorophyll.

"Ah...AH...I'm a...WILDVINE" she said. "Gwen please don't panic" Ben said, trying to calm her down. "DON"T PANIC!? LOOK AT ME! I'M A PLANT" she said, gesturing her viny hands to her new body.

Ben then looked at his omnitrix to see if he could fix this. "Ok ok, look I'll fix it and...hey look" Ben said as he looked at his alien watch. The wildvine icon was selected currently and the watch had some sort of laser pointer coming out of the dial. Ben figured out that the watch turned Gwen into a wildvine version of herself. "Check it out Gwen" he said, gesturing her to come see what he found out. Gwen, still not used to her new body and form, attempted to slither with her vines to Ben. She carefully moved her tendrils as she walked to Ben.

"I think I unlocked some sort of new command on the Omnitrix" Ben said. "When the watch selected wildvine, it activated a laser and turned you into Wildvine" he said.

"Well thats nice, but can you chane me back? I don't want to be a plant forever you know" she said. Ben decided to try and do what she said. He pointed the watch at Gwen again and pressed the button down. A bright light flashed and....

15533121.content: Is it Jimmy Jones (note in the last page, "he" was supposed to be Jimmy)?
15533121.title: Yes

155331211.content:
"Bye, I'll male sure I take care of him", Ben said to Jimmy's parents. They asked him to babysit Jimmy earlier. "So, wanna watch a movie?" asked Ben, "Yeah!" said Jimmy. He grabbed some food to eat while watching.

As he was munching away at the chips, he unconsciously went down and hefted his new-found paunch. It wasn't much, maybe 10 or 20 pounds, but it really showed on Jimmy's lean body. Because many alien threats have deceased more now, Ben has some time to relax. 'What would it be like to get even bigger?" Jimmy thought to himself. "All I can die is stuff myself!" Jimmy grabbed the phone and began calling every takeout place in the area while Ben was asleep.

Later, after all the food had arrived, Jimmy carried the food to the table next to the couch.. On the table were three large pizzas, 5 boxes of Chinese, 10 hamburgers, 15 buckets of fried chicken, and one five-pound piece of steak. Jimmy quickly ate the Chinese, and began working his way through the pizzas. Once he finished the first, he had to remove his shirt because it was constricting his stomach. Jimmy looked down between slices and saw that his paunch had grown into a full-blown belly. He finished the last pizza and leaned back on the couch. He brought the plate with the steak on it to rest on the crown of his belly. He took the steak in both hands and dug in with reckless abandon. Once all five pounds of steak were resting comfortably in his belly, he shoved the hamburgers one by one, and when he was done, he ate the chicken with many sauces he ordered. By the time he was done, he got some chips, ice-cream, and cookies. He put the cookies and mixed it with the ice cream, while he ate the chips. After each one shoved I'm his mouth, he then ate the cookies and ice cream.

By the time he was done, he gained 10 lbs when he got on the scale "That's a record, I can do 10 lbs a day", said Jimmy. "Well I'm tired", he said. He soon went back to sleep.
155331211.title: Jimmy packs on the pounds

1553312111.content:
A week later, Jimmy was packing on the pounds. At a rate of 10 lbs per day, it meant 70 lbs per week. He now weighed from 94 lbs to 164 lbs. He has a double chin, a big gut, and thick body parts. Everyday, he eats so much that it always gets packed into his gut. Fortunately, there were no alien threats to battle, so often Ben and Jimmy went to the mall to eat. He also has to wear spandex clothes to meet his growing gut.

"Boy, you sure eat a lot", said Ben while talking to Jimmy. "Can we go to an eating contest there?" asked Jimmy, where he pointed to a stand. "(Sigh) Ok, why do you eat so much?" said Ben. Jimmy jones ran to the stall, though he tried out several times.

After the contest (Jimmy won), Ben drove Jimmy home. He then stepped up on the scale and know weighed 174 lbs.
1553312111.title: Jimmy gets it
